member.name: M:API.Mapping.JsonFieldExtractor.GetAllFieldAnnotations(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates a list of all JsonProperty annotations set against a type's properties. Will not include @metadata extensions
member.param: The type to extract the JsonProperty annotations for
member.returns: A list of the JsonProperty annotation - excludes any @metadata extensions

member.name: M:API.Mapping.JsonFieldExtractor.GetPropertyAnnotation(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the JsonProperty annotation of a certain property without any @metadata extensions Throws InvalidOperationException if the field doesn't have a JsonProperty annotation
member.param: The type the property is attached to
The property - use nameof to ensure quasi strong type
member.returns: The name of the JsonProperty without any @metadata extensions applied

member.name: P:API.Models.Response.GetTrustsModel.Id
member.summary: The GUID of the Trust in TRAMS

member.name: P:API.Models.Response.GetTrustsModel.Address
member.summary: The multi-line address of the trust
member.example: Imaginary Trust "\r\n" Sample Road "\r\n" London SW14 5FJ

member.name: T:TRAMS_API.Controllers.TrustsController
member.summary: API controller for retrieving information about a trust from TRAMS

member.name: M:TRAMS_API.Controllers.TrustsController.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves information about a trust given its TRAMS Guid

member.name: M:TRAMS_API.Controllers.TrustsController.SearchTrusts(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for trusts via query parameters
member.param: Will search for trusts that contain the search query. The searchable fields are: Name, Companies House Number, and Trust Reference Number
